subject: Blocker: Validation Environment Prevents flake8/py_compile Execution

body.summary: Agent-7 remains in IDLE_AWAITING_RESPONSE for 'Overnight Swarm Automation' due to persistent environment issue preventing validation tool execution (flake8, py_compile). No tasks available in inbox or ready queue. Requesting Captain's guidance or assistance to resolve the blocker and proceed with project planning.
body.details: Environment issue has persisted across multiple cycles. Agent-7 cannot validate or complete tasks requiring flake8 or py_compile. Awaiting coordination from Agent-4 and Captain-Agent-5. Ready to attempt environment repair or alternate validation if directed.
